The Really Right Stuff (RRS) tripod is an excellent choice! It's a top-of-the-line tripod that's known for its exceptional stability, durability, and precision. I'm happy to report that the RRS tripod is compatible with your Canon EOS 80D camera.

RRS tripods are designed to work with a wide range of cameras, including Canon EOS models. The TVC-34L tripod you're considering is a popular choice among photographers, and it's compatible with your 80D.

To ensure a secure connection, you'll need to pair the tripod with a compatible tripod head and a camera plate. RRS offers a range of tripod heads, including the BH-55 ballhead, which is a popular choice among photographers. You'll also need a camera plate that's specifically designed for your Canon EOS 80D.

RRS offers a range of camera plates, including the B87-80D, which is designed specifically for the Canon EOS 80D. This plate is precision-machined to fit your camera's body and provides a secure connection to the tripod head.

It's great to hear that you've taken your camera on some amazing adventures! With a new tripod like the RRS TVC-34L, you'll be able to capture even more stunning shots on your future trips. The tripod's stability and precision will help you to take sharper images, even in challenging lighting conditions.

Before making a final decision, I recommend checking the RRS website or authorized dealers for any bundle deals that include the tripod, head, and camera plate. This can often be a cost-effective way to get everything you need.

I'm excited for you to get out there and capture more amazing shots with your new tripod!
